privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Slash & Dice, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: When you create an account with us, we collect the following information:

items.email: Email address - provided through your OAuth authentication provider
items.profile: Basic profile information - such as your name and profile picture from your OAuth provider
items.usage: Usage data - including your interactions with our service and preferences

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

purposes.authentication: To authenticate your identity and maintain your account
purposes.recovery: To enable account recovery if you lose access to your account
purposes.support: To provide customer support and respond to your inquiries

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. Your email address and personal data are kept confidential and are only used for the purposes outlined in this policy.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

rights.access: Access - You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
rights.deletion: Deletion - You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time
rights.correction: Correction - You can update or correct your personal information through your account settings

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through our support channels.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Read our terms and conditions for using Slash & Dice.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Slash & Dice, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration
accountRegistration.intro: To use certain features of our service, you must create an account. You agree to:

requirements.age: Be at least 13 years of age (or the minimum age required in your jurisdiction)
requirements.accuracy: Provide accurate and complete information during registration
requirements.security: Maintain the security of your account credentials

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.intro: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:

prohibited.harassment: Harassing, threatening, or intimidating other users
prohibited.illegal: Engaging in illegal activities or violating any applicable laws
prohibited.spam: Sending spam, unsolicited messages, or engaging in fraudulent activities

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time if you violate these Terms of Service or engage in conduct that we deem harmful to our service or other users.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new terms on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our support channels.
